about_the_game:
Thank you for playing our demo during Cooking Fest! Recently we won The Gamers Choice Award at GDEX 2024 and we are so honored to share this demo with you! First you should know the demo represents the core gameplay loop but does not include a lot of features in The Witches' Whisk. Below is a near-complete list of features coming in the future.

  • Cake & Cookie Decorating 🍰

  • Your own familiar with customizations 🐈

  • Customize your Witch 🪞

  • Bakery Upgrades ✨

  • Bakery Designer 🔨

  • Multiplayer 🧑‍🤝‍🧑

  • Broom Racing 🧹

  • A Unique Skill Tree 🔥

  • Unlock new recipes 🍞

  • Your Own Apartment 🏠

  • Full Story (Solo + Co-Op) 🎮

  • Free Play + Other Game Modes ♾️

If you like the demo, please wishlist and follow our progress on social media.

Thank you all so much!
Dyna & Travis (Lucky Roll Studio)

Manage a magical bakery with your witches' whisk — which doubles as a wand!

Bake pastries, cakes, cookies, and more by casting spells and enchantments to complete orders for your hungry customers. In the Witches' Whisk, you'll play as a witch who owns a bakery. You'll be tasked with bakery management, challenging spell casting, recipe unlocking, decorating desserts and more.

In addition, you will be able to build and upgrade your bakery, including decorating the layout and earning new spells along the way to help you take your recipes even further! You'll be able to decorate your baked goods in fun ways that are unique to your style that you can re-use later. Speaking of style... you will be able to create and customize your own character in this magical journey.

If you want to follow our progress or just chat with our community, please join our Discord! The link is in the side bar. We also have Twitter/ X, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, etc...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: CentOS 7 or other newer Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 | AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: CentOS 7 or other newer LinuxOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 | AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
